Description: Where founders build epic companies.

Description: RoomOrders is a cloud-based menu that brings hospitality into the Low Touch Economy by digitalizing orders and payments
Full Description: RoomOrders is a cloud ordering and payment platform that brings hospitality into the new Low-Touch Economy. RoomOrders was the first to Uberize Food & Beverage for hotels around the world with self-service In-Room-Dining via guest technology and now it is pioneering again with its concept of contactless hotel ecosystems. Imagine staying in a hotel that is digitally interconnected with its community of local vendors, from restaurants to bars, poolside, rooftops, beaches, supermakets, gift stores, beauty and health, sports, gaming and recreation, as well as tourist attractions. Now imagine seamlessly ordering and paying from your room, poolside deckchair, restaurant table, rooftop stool, roullete wheel, golf tee... RO improves the guest experience, while also increasing revenue for hotels, restaurants, bars and cafes. RO engages hospitality guests through a simple, easy to use platform, allowing them to order and pay using their own smartphone/tablet device, without downloading apps.

Description: Stop software supply chain attacks
Full Description: Software supply chain attacks delivered by sophisticated attackers have become a widespread and growing problem for organizations of all sizes, and have caused billions of dollars in damage. Karambit.AI stops these software supply chain attacks. Current mitigations like Software Bill of Materials (SBOMs) and open source vulnerability management programs neither consider attacks on closed-source software nor capabilities injected into end-user software as in the case of the SolarWinds capability insertion attack. Karambit.AI automates static analysis of compiled binaries and extracts behavioral intents to confirm that what is delivered is what the developer intended.
Headquarters Regions: Washington DC Metro Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Privacy and Security

Description: Lumo is a smart irrigation system that enables growers to save water, improve crop quality and reduce costs.
Full Description: Lumo will change the way we manage freshwater resources. According to the UN 40% of the world will be faced with water scarcity by 2030. 50-70% of freshwater is used by agriculture for irrigation. Current technology to measure and manage water resources is antiquated, the biggest incumbents are analog and manual. We’re going to bring software-first solutions to modernize water management. Our first product will simplify water management and water use reporting for grape growers in California. Irrigation is the #1 variable cost for specialty growers, which includes grapes, berries, and nuts. Lumo will drastically reduce these costs by saving water, energy, and labor – helping farmers better manage their water resources. We will scale into adjacent verticals like nuts, berries, and marijuana; expand into more geographies; and add additional capabilities like water rights reporting and trading.

Full Description: Pepper.AI is a SaaS technology company that was founded in Israel and then incorporated in the US last year. Pepper.AI has developed and patented a unique multi-party scheduling platform that works across providers. The goal is to reduce administrative friction (and the enormous associated costs) that occurs with scheduling meetings that include multiple attendees, different time zones, varying personal preferences, unknown travel times, and much more. Pepper.AI scheduling is initiated simply from your email and automatically checks the calendars of all invited parties to identify the soonest, mutually convenient, time slot. Description: GEn1E is a clinical-stage multi-target AI platform. They develop novel, next-gen, immunomodulators for rare & inflammatory diseases.
Full Description: GEn1E Lifesciences is a Clinical-stage, multi-target company with a unique AI platform. They develop novel, next-generation, immunomodulatory therapies for rare & inflammatory diseases with no effective treatments. GEn1E is supercharging the drug development cycle by applying AI to multiple-mechanism-of-action protein targets and their natural platform capabilities—creating novel therapeutics at an unprecedented pace. Their AI platform has enabled them to develop a purpose-built therapy for ARDS to reduce its $20 billion cost on society (just in the USA).    GEn1E has built a rich pipeline of 21+ novel and selective immunomodulators and has plans to accelerate 2 additional devastating diseases (beyond their lead indication) to IND in the next 12 months. Their AI platform enables tremendous pace and capital efficiency as demonstrated by their progress in ~2 years with seed capital—a stark contrast to the typical spend of $100M+ and 7+ years exhibited in the pharmaceuticals / biotech industry.   With ~90% of rare diseases having no therapeutic treatment at all, GEn1E is taking a giant swing that will hopefully bring life-saving therapies to the lives of patients in need.   GEn1E’s team has decades of experience in drug development and machine learning, and they graduated from YCombinator and Stanford-StartX in late 2019. GEn1E is based in Palo Alto, CA.

Description: Tarjimly connects refugees and immigrants with on-demand translators and interpreters.
Full Description: Tarjimly is a tech nonprofit and app that connects the world's 23 million refugees with on-demand translators that can help them integrate and communicate with medics, lawyers, and aid workers. Refugees can anonymously connect with a translator in 60 seconds and send text, pictures, documents, or even get on a phone or video call. We achieve this by training and making it easy for the world's 3 billion bilinguals to volunteer as on-demand translators. Tarjimly means "translate for me" and was founded by two immigrant MIT graduates, Atif and Aziz, who were deeply moved by the refugee crisis. In the last year, their 6,000 translators have helped over 15,000 refugees and NGOs globally and Tarjimly has been supported by Y Combinator, Echoing Green, and Fast Forward. Their mission is to eliminate humanitarian language barriers and prove that technology can mobilize millions of people and their remote skills to help refugees.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Apps, Information Technology, Professional Services, Software

Description: Cryptocurrency exchange and e-commerce solution
Full Description: The original vision of Bitcoin was to create a global payments network that would allow users to make peer-to-peer payments quickly, cheaply, easily, and securely without reliance on a central authority. However, today, cryptocurrency is regarded (by most) as a speculative investment or new asset class to trade and hopefully profit from, whereas it has much more potential than that. Eve is the first purpose-built subscription-based exchange and e-commerce solution for retail and institutional users A subscription-based exchange with a built-in real-goods marketplace/e-commerce solution, will not only make crypto more convenient & cost-effective but will allow it to function in commerce more efficiently.  Our mission at Eve Exchange is to provide the technology and infrastructure needed for people worldwide to harness the true power of crypto, not just trade it. As we transition towards better ways of storing value and transacting, we envision Eve being an epicenter for enhanced collaboration that harnesses the power of people and technology, and hope to impact the lives of millions!

Nurturing body and mind, Kaleidoscope promotes health, helping to make you more effective in daily life. Kaleidoscope creates a sense of well-being and energy – based on your own pattern. Description: Asylia Diagnostics - precision medicine data platform for immunotherapies
Full Description: Asylia Diagnostics is a diagnostics technology platform intended to provide safer immunotherapy for cancer patients. We collect molecular and real-world evidence data from patients treated with investigational drugs in clinical trials and patients treated by the standard of care. We then use our data platform and AI-powered technology to transform these highly heterogeneous patient populations into well-defined subgroups that share common molecular and immuno-pathophysiology profiles. By doing this, we are able to identify highly specific biomarkers and novel drug targets. We then use discovered endotypes, biomarkers, and drug targets to develop patient stratification, enrichment, and indication expansion strategies, early hits/leads for the therapeutic pipeline, and eventually complex theranostic products together with our biopharma and IVD partners.

This industry was long overdue for disruption, with 50%+ of healthcare facilities still using paper and disparate spreadsheets.  It is in everyone’s interest that healthcare facilities are always in compliance with The Joint Commission (TJC), not just when they are reacting to a periodic audit. Designed as an intelligent task management, collaboration, workflow, people first system we are so much more than CMMS software. HealthClicks provides best practices templates embedded to immediately help your organization easily pass regulatory audits, reduce daily facility risks, disease spread, and let managers know what the status of your facility is in real time. Operate efficiently to save time, money & maximize resources. One system to integrate and scale whether you have one facility or many locations HealthClicks provides full transparency and accountability from the C-suite to boots on the ground in real-time, while allowing your organization to instill a proactive patient first culture.

Description: SaaS, research-proven meditation classroom experience on XR headsets
Full Description: With ZenVR, we bring the real meditation classroom experience right to your home, work, or anywhere you can imagine. When you put on your VR headset and come to our virtual Zen dojo we make meditation as clear and structured as possible with our research backed curriculum. The fully immersive qualities of virtual reality allow us to bring our students to a separate space for meditation. No clutter still sitting in front of you on your desk or todo lists in your periphery - we remove the distractions of the outside world and engage you in a dedicated, peaceful, and realistic environment - without forcing you to leave your home or alter your schedule. VR also allows us to incorporate dynamic experiences to the classroom, such as teaching on a mountain top, or in a rainstorm, or with metaphorical tools like clouds floating by to represent thoughts. Things you could never achieve in real life! Unlike existing meditation phone apps,  we don’t just provide temporary relaxation; we teach with a focus on education, growth, and how to apply what you learn to your everyday life. Actual, practical, techniques, mindsets, and philosophies to use outside of virtual reality. We have a developed product launched on Oculus App Lab, Oculus Rift, and Steam VR marketplaces and initial traction with hundreds of paying customers in the first few months. We’re developing partnerships with key VR headset distributors and other wellness companies. And the Georgia Tech master’s thesis research backing ZenVR’s design has been accepted for publication at an industry defining conference this spring. With the behavioral health market valued at over $90 billion USD in 2020 and the VR market currently estimated from a 4.4 to 15.8 billion dollar industry and set to more than double by 2023, the timing for ZenVR could not be better.

Description: We are building a purpose-designed project platform, cybereum, to host projects (cybereum.io), and ai applications (cybereum.ai)
Full Description: Megaprojects are a significant and growing portion of global GDP accounting for several trillion dollars (USD) of economic activity each year. They deliver critical industrial and infrastructure developments that underpin modern society. Most are inefficient: approximately one in a thousand projects is a success, defined as on target for cost, scope and benefits, accounting for trillions in costs and unrealized benefits. Cybereum will transform project governance using 5th generation Blockchain Tech that combines DAG DLT and smartcontracts.  On the cybereum™ platform, you can create self-regulating project networks of stakeholders & milestones referencing a consensus-based, distributed single-source-of-truth with the property of trustless verification, where contract execution & value exchange can be automated. The project will become a responsive symbiotic goal-seeking organism holistically comprised of all stakeholders. We are creating its nervous system by combining incentive engineering, cryptographic methods, & AI.

Description: Use the spare change from your daily transactions to pay off your car loan, and get out of auto debt faster.
Full Description: More Americans carry auto debt, and they owe more on their loans than ever before. As of 2018, Americans collectively owed 1.25 trillion dollars. An increase of 75% since the end of 2009. With soaring inflation on everyday items, record-high gas prices, and the exploding cost of owning a car, it's clear that the country has an unsustainable debt problem in desperate need of a solution. Introducing Paydownhero. A convenient and easy-to-setup roundup app that securely connects your bank account to your car loan and then uses the spare change (roundups) from your daily transactions to make additional payments on your outstanding loan. The goal: To help car owners (not leasers, unfortunately) get out of auto-debit faster, cover their rising interest rates on their loans and put more money back in their own pocket.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Boston Area, East Coast, New England
Industry Groups: Apps, Financial Services, Software

Description: Where job seeking makes the most cents.
Full Description: Talk Hiring is an innovative leader in the employment marketplace. Job seekers can earn cash back for applying to jobs, track job applications automatically, and do interview prep all on Talk Hiring. Founded in 2018, NYC based Talk Hiring has helped thousands of job seekers find and secure good fit jobs and sustainable careers. Job seekers can search through over 10 million jobs found on our website that are all eligible for cash back. Job seekers start by heading to talkhiring.com to find openings. Each job posting has a different point value for applying, and 100 points equates to $1 USD. Since April 2022, Talk Hiring has paid out over $30K to job seekers. Job seekers can sign up for free with a Gmail account, and our platform tracks their job-relevant emails which allows us to know when an applicant has applied to a job automatically and reward them with cash back for their time spent applying. Once the application is submitted, the user’s earnings are transferred to them and deposited to the payout destination of their choice.

Description: We organize communities, equip them with the right tools and resources; and measure their impact and success.
Full Description: Seva Exchange offers a private social network with purpose where we organize communities, equip them with the right tools and resources; and measure their success and impact.The SevaX platform uses AI to match the needs of the community with the available resources of time, money, and goods within the community and beyond. Seva Exchange Corporation was formed in August of 2018 with co-founders Dr Edgar Cahn and Anitha Beberg. Seva Exchange Corp is seeking to reinvent volunteerism. Seva Exchange is a Delaware "C" Benefit Corporation, spun out of Timebanks.org. Edgar Cahn, the father of timebanking was the Chairman of our Board of Directors for the first two years. We are continuing to evolve Timebanks.org’s legacy of pioneering and scaling the exchange of services and time credits between volunteers. We have also embraced the Asset Based Community Development principles, where communities list out and share resources. "We have what we need if we share what we have," is our mantra. Anitha Beberg is our founder and CEO. We aspire to create positive social impact by equipping communities and nonprofit organizations with applications to make the most of local talents and raise themselves up.

Description: SolarSkyrise is a solar energy company that provides software solutions to analyze solar design.
Full Description: SolarSkyrise is a PropTech/CleanTech company. It provides software technology that allows real estate owners to generate a new, renewable revenue stream from an asset they already own, but do not use. Vertical real estate.  SolarSkyrise technology allows users to understand how much clean, renewable energy ALL surfaces of a building can produce, as well as the costs, returns, and environmental impact. This means that owners can look at whole portfolios of assets to understand the highest return and most impactful projects. We also track these factors in real-time, so that as things improve and change, owners know when, where, and how to capture this new revenue stream. All this information is packaged into an easy-to-understand project analysis, that captures the technical, economic, and environmental outputs of a project. It is important to note that SS engine works with both, existing buildings and planned buildings and uses its proprietary building context modeling and solar energy modeling platforms to create quick and accurate analysis. It is also important to note that SS doesn’t not represent any OEMs in the solar industry. It is technology agnostic and uses unbiased, engineer-verified solar technology data to calculate project outputs. The built environment is one of the world’s largest asset classes ($40 Trillion in the US) and contributors to growth and GDP (4% of GDP in the US). It’s also the second least digitized sector in the world according to McKinsey. Our technology enables new revenue streams from this asset class and helps make our buildings and cities sustainable and aligned with global climate targets.
